title: Project Test: ARTISH implements Tow Distinct
description: The ARTISH invoicing system demonstrates sophisticated separation of concerns while maintaining shared infrastructure. The `executionMethod` and `invoicingMethod` fields act as the primary control mechanisms, routing projects through entirely different workflows while ensuring data consistency and payment integrity across both systems.
